title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Protecting web apps & APIs with AI and an as-a-Service approach (SEC210)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用AI和即服务方法保护Web应用程序和API (SEC210)
abstract: Modern apps demand protection that matches cloud speed. In this session, learn best practices of implementing prevention-first security powered by AI engines to protect AWS-hosted web apps and APIs. This approach adapts to zero-day security issues in real time, and can simplify operations and keep latency low across a global footprint. You’ll see how organizations around the globe have hardened web and API traffic without heavy tuning. You will see a demonstration of WAF-as-a-Service that demonstrates AWS-native deployment through Marketplace, showing integrations to deliver unified policy, visibility, and faster, safer adoption. This presentation is brought to you by Check Point Software, an AWS Partner.
abstract_cn: 现代应用需要与云速度相匹配的保护。在本次会议中，了解实施由AI引擎驱动的预防优先安全的最佳实践，以保护AWS托管的Web应用和API。这种方法能够实时适应零日安全问题，并可以简化操作，在全球范围内保持低延迟。您将看到全球各地的组织如何在无需大量调优的情况下加固Web和API流量。您将看到WAF即服务的演示，展示通过Marketplace进行AWS原生部署，显示集成以提供统一策略、可见性以及更快、更安全的采用。本演示由AWS合作伙伴Check Point Software提供。

presenter.name: Eduardo Redondo Garcia
presenter.title: Global Head of Cloud Security Architecture
